baseMultiplierUpgrades.desc:
[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26][rainbow freq=0.2]base luck multiplier[/rainbow][font_size=1]
[/font_size][font_size=12] Tired of fishing up the same old garbage? This upgrade automatically increases your luck by 1x!
[tornado radius=4 freq=1]
(Oooh you wanna buy this)[/tornado][font_size=7]

(Message and data rates may apply)

[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26][rainbow freq=0.2]base luck multiplier+[/rainbow][font_size=1]
[/font_size][font_size=12] Tired of fishing up the same old garbage? This upgrade increases your base luck by an extra 4x!
Dont like it? [color=#FF0000][shake level=20]BUY IT OR ELSE!!!![/shake][/color][font_size=7]

(Message and data rates may apply)

[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=20][rainbow freq=0.2]base luck multiplier deluxe[/rainbow][font_size=1]
[/font_size][font_size=12]Love base luck multiplier+? then try our deluxe package! Add an extra 10x to the already existing multiplier!1!!
Still don't like it? [color=#FF0000][shake level=20]we still don't care.[/shake][/color][font_size=7]

(Message and data rates still apply)

[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=22][rainbow freq=0.2]base luck multiplier [shake level=10]ultra[/shake][/rainbow][font_size=1]
[/font_size][font_size=12]Don't miss out! Get our ULTRA package to get +15x luck multiplier!!!!
Dont you wanna fish better? [color=#FF0000]buy. it.[/color]
[font_size=7]

(Message and data rates still apply)

[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=22][rainbow freq=0.3]base luck multiplier [shake level=20]omega[/shake][/rainbow][font_size=1]
[/font_size][font_size=12]Pros use omega. Get it now for an extra 20x boost over other plans.
[color=#FF0000][shake level=20]BUY IT.BUY IT.BUY IT.BUY IT.BUY IT.BUY IT.[/shake][/color][font_size=7]

(Who cares at this point?)

cheapValueMultiplier.desc:
[font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26]Get more for your fish![font_size=16]
Tired of getting little cash for your common fish? Try our new book:
[i]"the secrets of ripping off your customers"[/i]!
Your satisfaction is garunteed!

locations.desc:
[center][font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26]need a vacation?
					[font_size=12]go on your dream vacation with an EXPEDITIONS(TM) traveler. This wonderful boat will give you the opportunity to explore the shadowy waters of the night patch!

[center][font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26]see the red sea!
					[font_size=12]go on your next vacation with an EXPEDITIONS(TM) wayfinder. This impressive boat will keep you afloat in the Red Sea, garunteed!

[center][font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=26]go farther than before!
					[font_size=12]take a trip to the Deep End with the EXPEDITIONS(TM) explorer. A ship that is durable enough to survive the deep waters!

[center][font n=res://Assets/Fonts/joystixMonospace.otf s=20]need to ruin a relationship fast?
					[font_size=12]go on a trip with a hated one to the Junk Patch with an EXPEDITIONS(TM) tanker. This boat will give you the trip you need to ruin that relationship with that special someone!
